name: Red hood behind the scenes
description:
This is my inspiration from little red riding hood story by brothers grimm,the one that telling us about the happy, reckless, and naive little child wandered alone in the middle of the forest to bring her sick grandmother a loaf of bread and got eaten by wolf that deceive her and the hunter came to safe her with ripped down the stomach and help her to get out from wolf's body with an axes.
This is my favorite child'story because the value that contain in this story still relate with the human's life espicially for adult'life that full of lies and deceit in society.this art is my fightings againts many problems that happen in my life as thet little child get her own axe to battle with a wolf without waiting for hunter to save herself.  We are someone who can helped ourselves. It sounds so difficult but with a big willing to continue life, we can seek for help from the others. But the first priority is ourselves, our life.
